Ja'Tovia Gary bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri nke bi na Brooklyn, New York
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na Whitney Museum, Studio Museum of Harlem, na ndị ọzọ

A maara ya nke ọma màkà ihe nkiri ya The Giverny Document (2019), nke natara onyinye gụnyere Moving Ahead Award na Locarno Film Festival, Juror Award na Ann Arbor Film Festival, Best Experimental Film na Blackstar Film Festival, na Douglas Edwards Experimental film Award site na Los Angeles Film Critics Association.
A mụrụ Gary na Dallas, Texas ma zụlite ya na Cedar Hill dị nso, n'ime ọbọdọ ụka Pentikọstal. Dị ka nwá akwụkwọ ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmemme ihe nkírí mpaghara ma gaa n'ihu nata diplọma ya na Booker T
Washington High School for the Performing and Visual Arts.

Gary chụpụrụ ọrụ ọkachamara na ime ihe nkírí mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ dara mbà n'obi màkà ọrụ na ihe odide ndị a na-enye ya. Mgbè ahụ, ọ debanyere aha na Brooklyn College ma mechaa nzere bachelọ nke nka abụọ na Documentary Film Production na Africana Studies.
O mechara nweta MFA ya na Social Documentary Filmmaking na School of Visual Arts
O nwekwara asambodo ihe nkírí Documentary Filmmaking site na LV Prasad Academy na Chennai, India.
Ọrụ Gary lekwasịrị ányà na isiokwu ndị dị ka ndị isi ojii na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị ma chee akụkọ ihe méré eme nke isiokwu ndị a ihu site na igosi ihe nkiri echekwara n'ọrụ ya
Ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi nke afọ 2015 An Ecstatic Experience jikọtara ihe nkírí nke ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Ruby Dee na ajụjụ ọnụ nke Assata Shakur, na-eji usoro ọ kpọrọ "direct animation".
N'afọ 2008, Gary pụtara na Grand Theft Auto IV dị ka Cherise Glover, ónyé na-ahụ na mberede.
Na June 2013, Gary so na ndị guzobere New Negress Film Society, otu ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-eme ihe nkírí nke na-achọ ịmepụta ọbọdọ ma mee ka a mara olu na akụkọ ndị isi ojii na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri.
